creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Child's hat of black satin in red and black satin embroidered in knot stitch with flowere in shades of pink, blue, green and yellow. Hat in two stafes soft crown with stiff, fringed brim and a snood to which is attached, in back, a flap of the red satin, also embroidered with flowers. Applied to brim, a paeede satin flower. Soiled. Lining of diapered blue silk.
title: Child's hat
